content.rendered:
beauty bar in whitby | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in whitby. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up
beauty bar in whitby | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 4150 garden street, unit 4. whitby, ontario L1r 0s1
  • 905-655-0777
  • whitby@thetenspot.com
  • licensed to serve alcohol

Hours

mon. 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

tues. 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

wed.: 10:00 am – 7:00 pm

thu. - fri: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat.: 9:00 am – 5:00 pm

sun.: 10:00 am – 5:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

Wonderful experience! Jordana was lovely - she helped me find exactly the right colour, style, and shape I wanted, which in the past has been a challenge. When I needed to have a few nails fixed, customer service was excellent and I was able to get them fixed without any additional charge. Looking... forward to my next appointment. Highly recommend!read more
Candice Jagnandan
1721925613
Today, my Mom and I experienced Ten Spot Whitby for the first time and are very much looking forward to the next! Marlene and her team at Ten Spot Whitby were so warm and welcoming. They provided us with excellent hospitality and services. They take their time and you feel very relaxed and well... taken care of in a wonderful atmosphere. We were so please with our manicures and pedicures. I highly recommend this location for anyone looking for quality service!read more
Nicole McDoom
1720844460
Ten Spot Whitby is a great place to just have a me time. I feel pampered everytime I go here. They also have monthly subscription which is excellent! And Im looking forward to get a facial here too. For now, only ten spot whitby makes me feel like a ten! All staff are friendly and of course Marlene... the owner is a kindhearted soul and empowering woman. I usually go to Anna for my nails but honestly everyone is professional and great in what they do and provides stellar client service. Looking forward for my next appointmentread more
Mariel Barcelon
1720260326
I have been coming here since this location opened and I could not imagine going anywhere else to get my nails and waxing done. Anna is next level AMAZING! The level of detail she takes when doing my nails is incredible. Even the owner Marlene displays the highest level of guest services and takes... the time out to come and chat with the clients.Best place around!!read more
Shannon Wallace
1718202587
I absolutely love and can’t say enough about The Ten Spot in Whitby! The service is wonderful and the staff and owner are truly the loveliest and the most talented people I’ve ever had complete laser & pedicures with (especially Jordana or Amber - sorry I didn’t catch her name today!). They make... you feel so welcome & comfortable, that it’s almost hard to leave at the end of your appointment!read more
Colleen Kamiya
1716999039
There is no set amount of words that can describe how professional and welcoming The Ten Spot was! My mother recently visited from Trinidad and she was very much taken care of and pampered when she received her pedicure. The spa was clean and gave a very comfy feeling. I must also thank Nicole for... her service, she gave off professionalism and interacted with my mother to make her feel appreciated; my mother was smiling from ear to ear. If I could've give 10 stars I would, totally recommend 5/5. 👌read more
casie rommer
1716945174
Anna is absolutely amazing!!!!! I can’t recommend her enough! She spent so much time making sure everything was absolutely perfect…and I’m very particular! I’ve never had better looking nails in my life and I’ve been getting my nails done for decades! She will be my go to forever! Thank you again... ☺️read more
Justine Stevenson
1714870970
Wow! We had a fabulous experience! Anna and Shrishti were both wonderful! This was my husband’s first pedicure and he is addicted! The spa was so clean and the staff was so friendly! We’ll definitely be back!
Lisa Carruthers
1714865928
Stellar experience here!Marlene (the owner) was so kind and welcoming from the second we walked in. The inside of the spa was super clean and neatly organized.I came in for brows and Amber, their aesthetician, did a stellar job at matching them up and making them much neater even though this... was the first time that someone else has done my brows in years. I have been scarred before many times by technicians making my brows way too thin or short, so I appreciated how reasonable she was and her skills.Marlene is lovely and babysat my boyfriend with a conversation while I was getting them done. 😂Will definitely be back soon!read more
Maia Norman
1714851762
I have been twice now, once for a pedicure and the next for a biab gel overlay manicure and both time the service was SUPERB! Anna has a keen eye for detail and my nails and feet have never looked better. The cleanliness of the salon, and the outstanding customer service makes the TENSPOT Whitby... the best place to treat yourself!read more
Brittany Loomis
1714756874
I had my lash lift, brow lam & tint today and it coincided with their one year anniversary.I would say that it was the best lash lift and tint I’ve ever had. The ambiance was so great, the staff was very welcoming and so many kids were getting free kids manicure. 😊I highly recommend this... place and I already booked my next appointment.read more
Marlo Harp
1713734951
I brought my daughter in for a free kids manicure today for the 1 year anniversary and the place was great! The place was very nice and very clean, they had the most friendly staff—they had popcorn for the kids, they offered me coffee, and they took great care of my daughter and gave her a... beautiful little manicure! Would recommend!read more
Nicki Brown
1713733709
My mother and I booked a mani-pedi and a brow wax today and it was a stellar experience.The brow wax service was amazing and nicely done. It was such a clean and welcoming environment, and the staff were very kind to us. My pedicure was probably my favourite part because I tend to be very ticklish... around my feet and the lady treating me was so accommodating and sweet! On top of that, I had an enjoyable time talking to her, which was honestly the highlight of the experience. My dad really loved how my mom was treated - absolutely made her feel like a ten! Thank you so much for this amazing experience, we will definitely return again!!read more
Chloe Saguil
1713477377
Visiting The Ten Spot for a manicure was an amazing experience. The atmosphere was welcoming and stylish, and the staff were incredibly friendly and skilled. The service was professional, with a great selection of colours to choose from. Looking forward to my next visit!
Kayla Ciccone
1712081946
I had an amazing waxing experience with Nicole at the Whitby location. She was very skilled, thorough and professional. I am very particular, having dark hair on light skin, and Nicole made sure that I was completely clean before letting me leave. Definitely the most comfortable waxing experience... I have ever had. The owners were also present, introduced themselves and ensured I had had a good experience.read more
Fauzia Kelly
1708883213
I have been here several times for a pedicure. The place is very clean and modern, the staff are very friendly and the quality of services is great. Marlene, the owner, is the cherry on top! She is warm and welcoming, it is clear that she cares about her customers and their experience. We've had... great experiences with many of the nail technicians, especially Anna! Definitely recommend this location.Thank you to the Ten Spot team!Koula & Nathalieread more
Nathalie E.
1707440518
(Update December 2023)Love my Christmas mani by Anna- see photos. Anna is amazing. The staff are friendly. The salon is always clean and sterile. The prices are maybe a wee bit more than other salons but thr quality here is amazing and they are not rushing you out the door. Again feeling like a... 10!(Update: August 2023) Nailed it again! Look at the design Anna created for my gel polish (Colour: Mimosa) mani! A great summer look! Always a pleasure at the ten spot Whitby.Sterile and clean. Friendly staff. Anna is an incredible estetician who made me feel like a 10! Reasonable pricing. Loved my experience and love all the orange!read more
K Whalen
1703340428
Every time I leave Ten Spot, I leave happy - and stare at my nails! Anna always does a meticulous, creative and flawless job on my bio gel overlay. And also it is such a beautiful, absolutely spotless space and friendly atmosphere in the bar as well. Totally recommend it.
Nic E. F.
1697683345
This was by far the BEST pedicure I have ever received! My appointment started on time, I could see brand new tools being used, and the pedicure service was thorough and relaxing.. I don’t think my feet have looked or felt better! My favourite part was the exfoliating beads with foot massage..... trust me you’ll love it! Kyla took her time while painting my toes and it really shows.. I can’t believe how precise and beautifully my nails were shaped and painted! On top of that, she is a wonderful person who I could chat with for hours! Do yourself a favour, pay the extra money for a visit to the Ten Spot-you won’t regret it! Thank you for a 10/10 experience, Kyla.. I can’t wait to come back for another pedi! 🧡read more
Shantel
1693826708
‹
›
